problemStatement: Most {audience} know online reviews influence which firms prospects choose, but asking clients for reviews feels awkward, gets forgotten during busy periods, or produces inconsistent results when left to individual team members.
solutionOverview: The firms getting consistent 5 star reviews are not asking more often. They are using automated systems that request reviews at the right moment, through the right channel, without anyone on the team having to remember. The result is a steady stream of authentic reviews that builds social proof on autopilot.

keyBenefits.title: Consistent Review Flow
keyBenefits.description: Instead of sporadic reviews that come in waves, your firm builds a steady cadence of authentic client feedback that search engines and prospects notice.
points: Reviews come in consistently, not just when you remember to ask
Recent reviews signal to Google that your firm is active and trusted
Volume builds naturally over time without manual effort

keyBenefits.title: Higher Visibility in Local Search
keyBenefits.description: Google prioritizes firms with more recent, positive reviews in local search results. A consistent review stream can improve where you show up when prospects search for {audience} in your area.
points: More reviews typically correlate with higher local search rankings
Recent reviews carry more weight than old ones
Review velocity signals an active, client focused practice

keyBenefits.title: Authentic Social Proof
keyBenefits.description: Prospects researching {audience} read reviews before making contact. A strong review profile builds trust before you ever speak with them.
points: Prospective clients often read 5 to 10 reviews before reaching out
Authentic reviews from real clients are more persuasive than any marketing copy
Reviews on multiple platforms expand your reach

howItWorks.title: Assessment
howItWorks.description: We review your current online presence, identify which platforms matter most for {audience} in your market, and assess your existing review profile.

howItWorks.title: System Design
howItWorks.description: We design automated review request workflows that trigger at the right moments in your client lifecycle, using email and SMS channels your clients prefer.

howItWorks.title: Launch and Monitor
howItWorks.description: We configure and launch the system, then monitor early results to optimize timing, messaging, and delivery channels.

howItWorks.title: Ongoing Optimization
howItWorks.description: We continue refining the system based on response rates and review quality, adjusting as your practice evolves.

results.description: Firms typically see a consistent increase in review volume within the first few months
Your team does not need to remember to ask or follow up manually
Clients find the process easy and non intrusive

faqs.question: Which review platforms should we focus on?
faqs.answer: It depends on where your prospective clients search. For most {audience}, Google Business Profile is the priority, but we assess your specific market during discovery.

faqs.question: Will clients feel pressured?
faqs.answer: No. The automated requests are designed to feel natural and are timed for moments when clients are already feeling positive about your service. Clients can easily ignore them if they prefer.

faqs.question: What if we already have some reviews?
faqs.answer: Great, we build on what you have. The system helps you maintain momentum and grow your review count consistently rather than in sporadic bursts.
